Claim: "9 million people died prematurely from pollution-related diseases in 2015"
Implication: "Pollution caused 16% of all deaths worldwide in 2015"
Referring expressions: 9 million people, pollution-related diseases, 2015  Pollution, all deaths, worldwide, 2015
Properties: IsDiedPrematurely(b),  IsFromPollution(c),  IsIn2015(a)  IsCausedBy(d),  IsDeaths(e),  IsWorldwide(f),  IsIn2015(a)
Formula: (exists c (exists b (exists a (IsDiedPrematurely(b) and (IsFromPollution(c) and IsIn2015(a))))) & (forall h (forall g ( IsDiedPrematurely(g) ->   IsDeaths(h)))) & (forall j (forall i (  IsFromPollution(i) ->  IsCausedBy(j)))) & (forall k (forall l ( IsCausedBy(k) ->   IsFromPollution(l))))) -> (exists e (exists d (exists f (IsCausedBy(d) and (IsDeaths(e) and IsWorldwide(f))))))
